• {{ player.web_name }}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Store } from '@ngrx/store'; import { compareState } from 'app/State/compareReducer'; @Component({ selector: 'app-compare', templateUrl: './compare.component.html', styleUrls: ['./compare.component.scss'], }) export class CompareComponent { elements!: any; constructor(private store: Store<{ players: compareState }>) { } ngOnInit() { this.store.select('players').subscribe(players => { this.elements = players.elements; console.log("this.store", this.store); }); } }
